full_summary:
=================================
### Office Chairs - Parks Canada Agency, Waterton, Alberta

**Procurement Information**

| Title (English)                                      | Title (French)                                       | Reference Number                                          |
| --------------------------------------------------------| --------------------------------------------------------| ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| Office Chairs                                            | Fauteuils de Bureau                                     | PW-22-01011171                                            |
| Amendment Number (English)                             | Numéro de Modification (French)                         | 2                                                         | 
| Solicitation Number (English)                           | Numéro de Sollicitation (French)                        | 5P420-22-0141A                                           |
| Publication Date                                         | Date de Publication                                        | 2022-10-28                                                 |
| Tender Closing Date (English)                           | Date d'Appel Offres Cloture (French)                    | 2022-11-15T16:00:00                                        |

**Tender Information**

* **Competition Type**: Selective Tendering (Competitive)
* **Contract Type**: Purchase, Delivery, and Installation of Office Seating
* **Requirement**: Office seating for Waterton Lakes National Park, Waterton, Alberta, by December 19, 2022
* **Supplier Eligibility**: Pre-qualified suppliers with a Supply Arrangement (SA) are eligible to bid. Non-Supply Arrangement (Non-SA) suppliers can submit a bid, but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation.

**Procurement Status**

* **Status (English)**: Expired
* **Status (French)**: Expiré

**Contracting Entity and End User Information**

* **Contracting Entity**: Parks Canada Agency
* **End User**: Parks Canada Agency
* **Address**: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 0B3, Canada

**Contact Information**

* **Name**: Amy Barrett-Lichter
* **Email**: amy.barrettlichter@pc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: 403-589-3402

**Attachments**

* [Tender Documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/10/98495c5ef121e4d3b947d60ec8db2e49/5p420-22-0141-rfb_amend_002.pdf)
* [Solicitation Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10
